mapper.select: select t1.PNO as no,t1.TITLE,t2.LEVEL from SPMS_PRJS t1, SPMS_PRJMEMB t2 where t1.PNO=t2.PNO and t2.EMAIL=#{value}
select PNO as no, TITLE, START_DATE as startDate, END_DATE as endDate from SPMS_PRJS order by PNO desc
select PNO as no, TITLE, CONTENT, START_DATE as startDate, END_DATE as endDate, TAG from SPMS_PRJS where PNO=#{value}
mapper.update: update SPMS_PRJS set TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, START_DATE=#{startDate}, END_DATE=#{endDate}, TAG=#{tag} where PNO=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from SPMS_PRJMEMB where email=#{email} and PNO=#{no}
select * from SPMS_PRJMEMB where email=#{email} and PNO=#{no}
select EMAIL, LEVEL from SPMS_PRJMEMB where PNO=#{value}
